works.title: Into the Hive-Mind: Shared Absorption and Cardiac Interrelations in Expert and Student String Quartets
works.abstract: Expert musicians portray awe-inspiring precision, timing, and phrasing and may be thought to partake in a “hive-mind.” Such a shared musical absorption is characterized by a heightened empathic relation, mutual trust, and a sense that the music “takes over,” thus uniting the performers’ musical intentions. works.title: When hearts beat as one -cardiac dynamics and synchrony in string quartet performances
works.abstract: This master's thesis examines the musicians' cardiac rhythms in string quartet performances. works.title: A pilot study of expressive body movement on audio parameters of piano performances
works.abstract: Body movement plays an important role in music performances and is widely studied by researchers.
